page.title: 17Kimbolton - Amenities
page.content: For a smallish community the most significant amenity must be the wide range of shops,followed by the 3 doctor medical practice,the dentist's surgery,the bank and the Post Office.The most historic amenity is the volunteer{Fire Service}first established in 1763.Kimbolton has 3 halls.The{Mandeville Hall}is used for village meetings,dances,whist drives.The{converted Baptist Church}is used for Youth Club meetings and elections.The{Lewis Hall}can seat 600 and is used for large scale functions.Kimbolton School owns this hall but encourages village use of it,when feasible,to promote good will. For the same reason other school facilities are available:the 22 rifle range,the swimming-pool,the tennis courts and even the State rooms of the Castle for important occasions.
